Field Detail

xPoints

protected int[] xPoints
The x coordinates for the polygon. Element 0 is the west (left-most) vertex, and the vertices are identified counterclockwise around the polygon.

yPoints

protected int[] yPoints
The y coordinates for the polygon. Element 0 is the west (left-most) vertex, and the vertices are identified counterclockwise around the polygon.

hasPolygon

protected boolean hasPolygon
True of a polygon has already been added to the simulation

Method Detail

getXPoints

public int[] getXPoints()
Returns the array of x coordinates of the polygon.

Returns:
An array of integers containing the x coordinates. The array will be exactly the same size as the number of vertices.

getYPoints

public int[] getYPoints()
Returns the array of y coordinates of the polygon.

Returns:
An array of integers containing the x coordinates. The array will be exactly the same size as the number of vertices.

dataComplete

public void dataComplete()
Once the data has been received and verified, this causes the receiving robot to drive backward a small amount, as a visual indicator that it is complete.
